body.p:
To his Excellency Govenor Robinson
Dear Sir

The undersigned citizens of Grant County, Would Respectfully petition You to remit a fine Which was imposed in the Grant Circuit Court on Yesterday amounting to one hundred & Eighty Sevan Dollars for a breach of the peace against Benjamin McGlasson, He was charged With Striking Harmon Childers, With a hickory Club. The undersigned Many of whom were present at the trial and some were of the Jury who tried the case beleives that the testimony although sufficient to authorize the verdict ^of Guilty^ Was not of a character to Justify an imposition of so heavy a fine, and they say that Mr McGlasson is a respectable and poor Man. and generally peacible and well disposed, and we hope Your excellency will releive him;

J. O'Hara
J, H, Webbs
G. W. Grant
D. E. Craig
O, D, McManama
Mr McGlasson is a peacable man
